content: An 80-year-old man, a resident of Santa Luċija, was taken to Mater Dei Hospital for some injuries he sustained in a traffic accident in Luqa Road, Luqa.It resulted from initial investigations that the victim was hit by Nissan NV 200, which was being driven by a 22-year-old man from Għaxaq.The man was assisted by a medical team, taken to hospital by an ambulance and later certified to have sustained grievous injuries.Police investigations are ongoing.
